Q1.label: Q1
Q1.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations make your shopping experience more interesting?
Q1.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q2.label: Q2
Q2.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations make your shopping experience more enjoyable?
Q2.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q3.label: Q3
Q3.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations help you make more informed purchase decisions?
Q3.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q4.label: Q4
Q4.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations help you make more accurate purchase decisions?
Q4.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q5.label: Q5
Q5.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations adequately meet your needs in your purchase decisions?
Q5.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q6.label: Q6
Q6.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations improve your shopping experiences?
Q6.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q7.label: Q7
Q7.question: To what extent do you agree that product recommendations improve your shopping outcomes?
Q7.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q8.label: Q8
Q8.question: To what extent do you agree that it is easy to understand product recommendations?
Q8.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q9.label: Q9
Q9.question: To what extent do you agree that it is easy to understand how to use product recommendations?
Q9.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q10.label: Q10
Q10.question: To what extent do you agree that it is easy to learn how to use product recommendations?
Q10.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q11.label: Q11
Q11.question: To what extent do you agree that it is easy to learn how product recommendations operate?
Q11.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q12.label: Q12
Q12.question: To what extent do you agree that it is likely you will continue purchasing products from Amazon?
Q12.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q13.label: Q13
Q13.question: To what extent do you agree that you will purchase products from Amazon next time you need them?
Q13.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q14.label: Q14
Q14.question: Suppose that a friend wants your advice on his/her search for some products; to what extent do you agree that you would recommend him/her to purchase them from Amazon?
Q14.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

Q15.label: Q15
Q15.question: To what extent do you agree that you will definitely purchase products again from Amazon?
Q15.options: 1 = Strongly Disagree, 2 = Disagree, 3 = Somewhat Disagree, 4 = Neutral, 5 = Somewhat Agree, 6 = Agree, 7 = Strongly Agree

D1.label: D1
D1.question: What is your current working status?
D1.options: 1 = Full-time employment, 2 = Part-time employment, 3 = Casual employment, 4 = Self-employed, 5 = I am not currently employed (e.g., students, retired)

D2.label: D2
D2.question: What is your education background?
D2.options: 1 = Less than high school, 2 = High school graduate, 3 = Bachelor's degree, 4 = Graduate degree

D5.label: D5
D5.question: How many years have you used Amazon?

D6.label: D6
D6.question: How many times did you shop on Amazon during the last three months?
D6.options: 1 = Zero, 2 = Once, 3 = Twice, 4 = 3-6 times, 5 = More than 6 times
